title: My Housekeeper - Novel Updates
tags: Apartment Life   Beautiful Female Lead   Bickering Couple   Boss-Subordinate Relationship   Businessmen   Clever Protagonist   Cold Protagonist   First-time Interc**rse
author: Dong Qing   冬情
description:
She's a very planned person, where everything has to be done on a schedule.

However...she runs into a super uncooperative boss!

His personality is arrogant and rude, and he is extremely hard to deal with—

He will either not go home to sleep for three days, or he will come home in the middle of the night, and then he will wake her up at 3:00 in the morning just to cook for him?!

'You're my housekeeper, and it's your duty to meet my needs.'

Listen to this guy. Truly hard to get along with!

Very well. She's his housekeeper, right?

She, Qiu Xiaoya, has immediately gotten into a dispute with him.

If she doesn't 'take a really good care' of him, she'll take his surname!>
